version_description:
- New Chapter 8
- New type of weapons - Plasma Rifle and Plasma Rifle Small
- New localizations - Japanese, Chinese, Indian, Korean
- GameCenter - saving to cloud
- Golden Safe in Battle Pass
- New 3 super items
- and many others...

• New Chapter 9 - Graveyard
• Online Arena! - Fight against other players and get big rewards
• Christmas decoration
• New encounter in the game - Air Drop
• Ability matching system (if you don't have minions, you don't get minion abilities)
• New items
• and many others...
